thread.title: This comedy legend’s take on PC culture is pure gold (10 photos)
thread.title_full: This comedy legend’s take on PC culture is pure gold (10 photos)

author: Alex
title: This comedy legend’s take on PC culture is pure gold (10 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
There are two camps of people on the internet that need to be stopped. There’s the shithead edgelord “provocateurs” who will make a racist joke and attempt to pass it off as a statement on free speech. Then there’s the equally terrible “social justice warriors” who browse the web looking for something to be offended about . Both want nothing more than attention. While the former is easy to condemn, it’s tough to speak out against SJWs as their cause can appear so well-intentioned. But comedian John Cleese, whose livelihood is threatened by the movement more than anyone, does a pretty damn good job. 2
